input.sentences: this is my sister [female] in her roller derby outfit . this was the first game of the season .
i watched from the stands as she welcomed the opponents and all looked happy .
then | it went a little sour about 5 minutes into the game .
this girl pictured in pink was not nice and she is what started | yes | a pile-up .
the refs came running over but it was too late | the situation was getting ugly . it took over 5 minutes to calm everyone down and restart the game .
output.sentences: Roller derby season began with the return of Sister X., leader of the X team.
Everyone in the stands welcomed her back and watched her arm wrestle the pink team before the game.
Minutes into the game things went sour.
The pink team lost a player who was ejected for piling on Sister X.
The situation got worse as both teams were running to clash in an ugly brawl.
